modName: Final Fantasy Cloud Advent Children Armor
summary: Add Cloud armor from Advent Children.
descriptionHtml:
This is Cloud Strife armor from Advent Children.
Very cool indeed, damn I really love his armor.
You can craft it in any forge, under leather section
If you want to make your sword position behind your whist, download my other mod sasuke sword style, it makes you pretty much looks like cloud swords position hehee

Add optional file :
1. Glove now have texture
2. Change skirt animation, better i hope **NEW** now upgradeable
 
This is not a lore friendly mod, you can download another cloud armor that has more lore friendly by maymay1588 at
www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29367

Thanks to hothtrooper44  and Timmy19992 who teach me a lot
And special thanks for maymay1588, she helped me out from the start I learn to make an armor, without her this mod will never exist.

My other mod
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27521] Sasuke Sword Style [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28348] Rogue Race based on Sasuke sword style [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28779] Itachi and Kisame from Akatsuki [/url]
author: Benk
